website_summaries.verdict: A rugged workhorse designed to meet major meat processing needs. The highest quality available.
cons: A 47 pounds, it uses a lot of space
Not recommended for the dishwasher (but the stainless steel parts could survive it)

customer_reviews.title: Glad a bought it
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It is very fast. I can grind 30 lbs of meat in about 10 minutes--bones and all. I use this machine primarily to make raw dog food. Also, use it to make my own ground beef--it is so much better and you know what is in your meat! It is a bit pricey but well-worth it. The pieces are all metal. It's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SheRox1968

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for deer season and to replace the old Chinese junk one I had. Let me start by saying some of the reviews say this is loud. It's not. At all. It also is fast and efficient at grinding. We double grind our hamburger at the coarse and fine setting and it had 0 issues with this. We also used it to make turkey sausage and it had 0 issues, once again. Buy this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: ARRRRR

customer_reviews.title: If you are a RAW feeder, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: What a workhorse this is! I ground up 90 pounds of chicken in under 30 minutes. A real time saver and worth every penny. Don't waste your money on cheap grinders, you'll just end up buying a LEM!
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased this long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this long time ago! I have processed two elks, and six deer. With my old grinders it would have taken many days to process. It only took about 7 hrs to process all of these! I am very pleased with this machine. Make sure you get the foot switch. It helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Ochillee

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I HAD EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS NOT WHAT I EXPECTED. THIS MACHINE IS NOT VERY STRONG. IT JAMMED ON ME 5 TIMES IN 20 MINUTES AND I HAD TO TAKE IT APART TO UNJAM IT. IT JAMMED ON A CARROT AS WELL AS SMALL CHICKEN BONES. I'M MAKING MY DOGS RAW FOOD AND I'VE USED GRINDERS BEFORE BUT THIS ONE IS NOT STRONG AT ALL. I DON'T RECOMMEND IT
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Never met a sausage I didn’t like.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! LEM customer service is also fantastic. Spend the extra cash and buy a good one. It’s truly a quality product. I have feeling my kids kids will be using this long after I’m gone. It is HEAVY and LARGE so make sure you have space in your pantry for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Powerful grinder!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome grinder. I got a big deer this past season and had butchered it myself resulting in a fair amount of frozen chunked up stew/burger meat. I've never known quite what to do with so much "stew meat" so I bought the LEM. I think this thing could grind rocks! It went through partially thawed venison like a hot knife through butter. We've enjoyed wonderful venison burgers and home made sausage since. I'm glad I paid for quality and power - worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: JerryNich

customer_reviews.title: Insanely good.
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is great. Couldn't even keep up with it grinding meat. After owning and have a bunch of cheaper grinders break I spent the money on this and glad I did. Quiet and fast. Had a bad grinder plate. Wouldn't fit on the auger and had machine marks on face. Called lem and they said no problem and sent me a new one. Had it in 2 days. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: cdemarse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grinding raw dog food
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to grind our own raw dog food and it is perfect. It easily grinds all we need including chicken bones, small rib bones and turkey bones. It assembles and disassembles easily and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing even with deer meat.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more stars. I process my own deer meat the smaller grinders clog and must be cleaned every minute or two. This baby has a 4 inch tube and cutter , and doesn't hesitate at all. Never clogged once and worked until the job was finished. Then I put the sausage stuffer to work with the same results. With the cost of processing meat, it paid for itself on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: John Miguez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grind
customer_reviews.text: Went through 40 lbs of semi frozen chicken (with bone in) and other meat products (RAW dog diet) like they were butter. Super simple to use. If your making your own dog food, or grinding game meat, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Cavalier Mom

customer_reviews.title: Plate already showing sign of rust after first wash.
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. Work great. My only issue is the plate that came with it already showing sign of rust after first time washing it. Spoke to customer service. Told me to just scrub it off. But the point is it suppose to be stainless steel not suppose to rust first time washing it. From the look of it they are not going replace it. Wouldn’t buy any of their product again. Stainless will just get rust.
customer_reviews.author: Triet

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder that will last
customer_reviews.text: I needed to upgrade my from a cheap Chinese grinder to something that would make processing deer faster. After doing a lot of research I decided to go with the LEM. I was very impressed with the build quality, it is all stainless steel and a heavy duty build. This grinder is built to last and I am sure it will be the last I need. It is easy to clean and the large pan is a plus and makes grinding go faster. The motor is not loud in my opinion. I have used it three times and while I wish it had a faster speed, it steadily plows through meat with no issues and never bogged down.
customer_reviews.author: MRiley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Typical LEM quality! Replaced cheaper LEM meat grinder that still works (aluminium head and feeder) but wanted stainless steel grinder head (Big Bite). Have already done 1⁄2 a cow. Rarely hear the motor bog down. Easy clean-up of grinder head in dishwasher. Power unit easy wipe off with chlorine type wipes. So far anything from LEM has been good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Y. Banquer

customer_reviews.title: IS LEM short for lemon?????
customer_reviews.text: After 1 use this product was useless. As shown in the photo the thread into the shaft of the auger became worn and when the blade assembly could not be properly secured into the shaft. The auger was therefore spinning but no torque was being applied to the cutting blade. It was an epic failure. Such a poor design for this so called heavy duty machine. i would give zero stars if this were possible.
customer_reviews.author: lorne

customer_reviews.title: Bought one they said the box was damaged!!!!!!!!!!!! so ok....
customer_reviews.text: They didn't say it was used, FRK'N LIARS........ RUST and debris on #10 plate and you can see the spin marks on the other plates... also they the tubes are SSTEAL no their not!!!!! PLASTIC ...
customer_reviews.author: R..k..

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Grinder
customer_reviews.text: We make our own cat food with raw chicken. For years we have used a $100 grinder that served our purposes but it took forever. Had to grind twice (large then fine) and 2 whole chickens took about 30 minutes to grind and was very noisy (I had to wear earplugs). This #12 LEM grinder literally did 2 whole chickens bones and all in about 7 minutes. It was effortless and very quiet. Great product and I don't know why i waited so long to buy.
customer_reviews.author: mikebot

customer_reviews.title: Application Specific
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the name branding and the reviews. Although it had great reviews, it did not work well for me. I will use this unit 1-time a year to simply grind horseradish. I tried it, it plugged within the 1st minute plus a dozen more times, and the real negative, there is not a reverse on this model. It was very hard to get it unplugged. Maybe one of their bigger units would be better, but for only a single use, 1-day per year, it wasn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Raw feeding/grinding bone and meat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grind chicken, bones and all for my dog. It doesn't do the job. There is no reverse function. Bones and skin jam up the augur. If you are looking for a grinder to help with raw feeding your animals then this is not the one you want. It grinds meat well if that's all you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fast and heavy duty ! You get what you pay for .
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a kitchen aid mixer attachment for a couple years and I was tired of wasting time and decided to upgrade to the #8 . Holy cow what a beast . I ground around 25 lbs of venison is the blink of an eye compared to a kitchen aid mixer . I’m well aware of the cost but if you do your own processing.... get this machine !!
customer_reviews.author: EMS Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Beats old hand crank!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to this from a hand crank style that took forever to grind meat. My husband is disabled and needed some thing better that would still allow him to process our deer meat. This grinder has taken what took days previously to minutes! I read another review that mentioned some rust spots and we have not had any after multiple uses. I also read a tip to put them in the oven to sterilize/dry the attachments and that has seemed to work well. The feeding tube is a little difficult to clean, he uses a toothbrush to help. We also got the LEM dehydrator for jerky and a vaccum sealer. It has all come together like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I use this to grind chicken quarters for my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to grind chicken quarters for my dog. The feeding hole is a bit small IMO, so I have to trim the chicken quarters before putting them in the grinder. It is solid. 30 min for 60 lbs of chicken which feeds my dog for a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yang

customer_reviews.title: Buying a big brand name like LEM meant I had access to all kinds of ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Buying a big brand name like LEM meant I had access to all kinds of attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a little power House. I got the #8 to process a deer and I am so glad I did. It grinds faster than I could keep up. More than enough horse power for a casual at home user in my opinion. I was able to jump straight into the fine grind and it had zero issues. Well worth the 300$ for me. Surprised at how quiet it was also, the motor is very well made and does not make a ruckus. While my buddy is still feeding his kitchen aid attachment I am already packaging and cleaning up, turns an hour's worth of grind time into 15mins. Also very convenient that it comes with a sausage attachments.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego machinist

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. We butcher our own cows chickens and pigs, and we used to have a butcher ground meat, and now we don't have to. This unit is fast and strong. We are so happy with it. Just don't expect it to pulverize all the ligaments or tendons. You should clean up your meat that is to ground to some extent anyway. As long as you cut off the big nasty ligaments and such this is a great meat grinder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this grinder. I feed my dogs raw and grind a lot of their meat including farm raised chickens and rabbits. Bones are not problem!!
customer_reviews.author: happy tastebuds

customer_reviews.title: Never tried it
customer_reviews.text: Product came knowingly used however not cleaned out!! There was rotting meat in it!
customer_reviews.author: Getoutside

customer_reviews.title: Open the package and ensure all parts are to the product.
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate this effectively since I haven't been able to use the grinder, but... I got this as a Chrismas gift in 2018, finally tried to use it in June 2019 to find that it was missing the big bite washer and the plate screw that connects the cutting plate to the grinderwas the wrong size making the device unusable. Tech support only open during business hours, and had to go online to LEM to order a new parts. On the plus side the parts diagram online is very useful making it realatively easy to order the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday and ground up 12 pounds of beef and venison for summer sausage. Then used it to stuff the sausage in the casings. Worked great. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: southern ohio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Give it to Mickey he eats anything. Have ground over 100 lbs pork, beef and turkey. If you want fine grind no need to course grind then fine grind. Grinds product easily through fine plate on first pass. Ground product looks great. Purchased foot pedal control, works great with grinder but not a necessity, I just like having control, and reduces time or opportunity cutter blade can run dry against the grinder plate. If stuffing sausage the foot pedal would be great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and practical
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the kitchen aide accessories we're used to, this thing is a monster. It's fast, efficient, sturdy and the fact that it grinds small bones makes for quick work feeding the dogs, so they're happy too. It's super easy to use and easy to clean. Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Nope!! Dont Purchase it!
customer_reviews.text: Horrid doesnt even begin to describe it. It took me hours to grind 6 packs of chicken breasts!!! Uuuugh! Parts cannot be put in the dishwasher. This could be a new kind of torture! Needless to say -Back it went! If you want to grind meat or chicken, without spending an entire day standing on your feet till you are ready to drop, DO NOT PURCHASE THIS! Spend more money for a higher quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: messgnabottle2u

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Dog food grinder worth buying
customer_reviews.text: bought this unit to make BARF (Biologically Appropriate Raw Food) for my GSD's. We tried the kitchen aid attachment, and a 125$ unit with limited success. This unit laughs at chicken bones. Drop it in and it spits it out. Not loud but there are warning lables that tell you it may be. I suspect after some use it will get louder but so what. Easy to clean. All metal construction. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: colazi

customer_reviews.title: Easily Jam with very small pieces of poultry bone.  Has no reverse for clearing it when it jams.
customer_reviews.text: I planed to use this machine to grind small poultry for home made dog food. I Bought this grinder because other people reviewing said it could grind small bones. On the first bird the machine jammed twice. There is no "reverse" for the grinder so every time it jams machine must be disassembled. Very inconvenient to use and the grinder is underpowered. I will go back to using my smaller and much less expensive machine.
customer_reviews.author: brad Rawe

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder
customer_reviews.text: This meat grinder is freaking amazing!! Does the grinding very quickly and efficiently. It’s a bit hard to get to some areas while cleaning of the tube meat goes through but otherwise a great product. Do wash it and DRY it right away or like other grinders, you can get that black stuff on it. It’s generally not an issue for me and I also use food grade silicon spray (LEM brand) to prevent any type of rust. I also use it to stuff sausage and it does a good job with that as well.
customer_reviews.author: ij1001

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't buy this earlier. Been through some cheap ones and used some other big brand names. This product grinds meat FAST. Construction is great and heavy duty. Ground 30 #'s of semi frozen meat in under 5 minutes without having to use the plunger at all. It just fed through and came out great. I did order the 1/4" grinder plate which I much prefer compared to the two provided with the machine. Looking forward to many years of hunting seasons with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: B Mitch

customer_reviews.title: The bottom line is that it chews up meat in a hurry and makes great burger. I have no doubt that this grinder ...
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of long reviews on here that can attest to the ability of this grinder. The bottom line is that it chews up meat in a hurry and makes great burger. I have no doubt that this grinder will last many years and eventually be passed down to one of my children.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C Gorr

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Very productive! Ground about 200 pounds of white tail front shoulders and trimmings, didn’t miss a beat! Clean up was easy and quick! Considering we had been using a hand powered grinder...this thing is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks but damaged box
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a great machine and its heavy duty....i gave only fours stars because off how it came....the box was crushed on one corner and a dent on the side of the box.....thank you for the styrofoam on the inside it protected everything.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: This is one GREAT grinder.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is more efficient and than quieter than described. It grinds the meat an an incredible rate. The clean up is quicker that I had imagined. All parts are stainless steel, except the screw knob to attach the head to the machine, the stomper and stuffing tubes. I had a grinder that attached to my Kitchen Aid mixer but ti was mostly plastic and it cracked after a few uses. My #12 is perfect for my use of grinding my own beef. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Just used for first time. Ground 30 lbs of venison. It performed flawlessly. Very powerful, no overheating issues. This is the third grinder I've owned. The other units were smaller and less powerful. I was able to perform the same tasks in about one third the time it takes with my previous grinder. Appears to be solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEM Grinder is Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this recently, the LEM # 12, and used it last weekend to grind 50 lbs of fresh pork. We made 25lbs of sausage and 25lbs of Brats. The stuffing tube worked great and this grinder is a workhorse. We ground all 50lbs in a very short time. I had been a meat cutter for years, working with large Biro and Hobart grinders and for the size, this thing is a powerhouse. Easy to clean, easy to operate. We look forward to using it again and again. Very nice grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Mohn

customer_reviews.title: It does as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: With cool/cold meat, the grinder does not heat up. The head is always cold. The "big bite" really works as advertised. Should have bought this years ago. Remember to get extra blades and only use one blade per plate. Important to use the plate on the same side. Plate and blade wear a certain way. Keeping them the same, makes for a longer life.
customer_reviews.author: Texascook

customer_reviews.title: This grinder is 1/3 the size and 1/4 the weight and grinds just as good and just as fast
customer_reviews.text: Grinder is very well made. I ha e ground probably 75 lbs of venison and beef fat. I replaced a probably 1960's Hobart commercial #22 Grinder with this one . This grinder is 1/3 the size and 1/4 the weight and grinds just as good and just as fast. Great grinder. The only small issue I have found is the diameter of the stomper is too small which causes you to spend some time scraping the sides of feed tube .
customer_reviews.author: stephy

customer_reviews.title: What a beast.
customer_reviews.text: This beast is amazing. We have ground up so much meat in it we have also ground up frozen veggies for dog food and this thing gets the job done. Very happy for the product and dont mind spending extra for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony kinser

customer_reviews.title: It has the power to do the job
customer_reviews.text: It has the power to do the job. It grinds the chicken with the bone as fast as I put it in, so the job was done really fast. We make our own raw chicken for our cats and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: LEM :: Real Quality - Real Performance
customer_reviews.text: This LEM Stainless Steel, Big Bite Electric Meat Grinder #5 is the real deal! I appreciate the quality every time my wife & I use it: - It's **Very Quiet**, which indicates to me that it has a strong motor. It just purrs along and handles everything just like a butcher shop. - It's also a real bargain! I would buy it again even if priced higher!! - Best of all, my wife Took to it in a Flash, ...and started making massive amounts of Thai sausage. I also purchased the Foot Control, and big plastic Mixing Bin (LEM Heavy Duty Meat Lug). Both are very convenient, we use them all the time! I'm also pleased with LEM casings.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN KIRKISH

customer_reviews.title: Brains required.
customer_reviews.text: It works. It’s kinda hard to clean. The nooks and crannies are not that accessible. I sometimes put the parts in the dishwasher because I have a lot on my plate, and a smart ho values her time. Can’t be bussing studs when its time to bus down, oops. Nothing bad happened, but this action is certainly frowned upon by the manufacturer and probably Jesus.
customer_reviews.author: Bruquta

customer_reviews.title: This grinder is the product that lives up to it name.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying being able to grind my own hamburger and to be able to grind meats for jerky without a problem. I highly recommend the grinder as it is easy to operate and clean. Follow the instruction on prepping the meat to grind as it is very important and will grind much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grinder
customer_reviews.text: My husband started deer hunting a few years and processed his own meat. He was using one of those hand grinders you mount to the counter to make burger and jerky meat. It was a slow and frustrating process that I could no longer bear to watch. I purchased this grinder for his birthday. He absolutely loves this grinder. Not only does he use it to grind meat, he has started making homemade sausage with it as well. It has been an essential appliance in our household. I am not sure how we lived without it before.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shumway

customer_reviews.title: Buy one
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grinder a few times now and is a grinding away. I grind up 15 to 20lbs of brisket for ground meat I can hardly keep up with feeding the hopper. Great machine for under $300.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Can handle heavy duty operation.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size grinder for me. Will handle anything. Very smooth operation. Commercial grade. Love the big bite spiral.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Corpening

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought this 30 years ago. It grinds meat like a commercial unit. I am amazed at how well is does it's job. It is easy to clean and will grind meat about as fast as you can toss it in. It grinds the meat exactly how you would want it to.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Making Raw Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: What a GREAT grinder. It grinds WHOLE chickens. Keep in mind, you have to chop up the chicken into smaller pieces in order to fit into the grinder feed hole. It is easy to clean, relatively quiet, heavy duty parts. Fantastic product for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grinder2 times and looks like the perfect one. The 3/4 hp is the one you want to go through chicken bones easy. It is all stainless and excellent workmanship. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with .5 hp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for processing your own deer. Never bogged down, easy to clean up, ran quite, it ate everything that was put in it. I thought it could be bought cheaper at Academy till I realized theirs was the aluminum Mighty Bite, not the stainless Big Bite.
customer_reviews.author: bawana juju

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have been grinding my own briskets and pork butts for a few months now and I can never go back to pre-ground meat from the store. I got the #22 Big Bite grinder and wish I had done it years ago. I cut the meat into chunks and partially freeze to help solidify the fat so it goes through the grinder with no trouble at all. I've never had it bog down or clog up. It is easy to use and very easy to clean. It's one of the best food prep/kitchen purchases I've ever made. This is a very high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: gdurhamus

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: High quality unit. Very impressed with the performance. Went through a 15 lb brisket in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bmag

customer_reviews.title: The machine is very good, but receiving it with a fault.
customer_reviews.text: I received my LEM Products 17801 Big Bite # 12 .75HP Stainless Steel Electric Meat Grinder purchased. I have a problem with the deposit indicated as position 50 -51 of the manual Drawer - Drawer panel, it does not stop in its closed position, it remains open, as if the internal closure is damaged, can you tell me how to check it for repair since the manual does not indicate it . The machine is very good, but receiving it with a fault is not the best to give an optimal final rating. I hope I can have help to repair or replace the part that is not working properly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Bieder

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mixer to make sausage, which is our annual tradition. We were able to make 600lbs of sausage and the mixer was great, never got hot and worked really well. We also bought the mixer that attaches to it to mix everything up. The only reason for the four stars is that the motor does not go in reverse, which isn’t a deal breaker but would add to the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The grinder came as advertised, except the small drawer wouldn't close. The little latch/catch in the back of the drawer was broken. We contacted customer service to ask advice on how to fix it and order the part. And they offered to send a new drawer..no hassle... So far, we are pleased with LEM's great customer service, as well as the product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Neuenschwander

customer_reviews.title: Great meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: ok just received this item washed all parts assembled. Then I plug it in and it will not turn on. I’m pretty handy so I open the case to take a look. One of the wires was not hooked up on the switch. I hooked the wire up and now it works. Ground 25lbs of venison double grind in less that 30 minutes. Hope I have no more issues. I seems to be a quality unit time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: Definatly worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line is you can't go wrong with this product lets face it it is made by LEM. Overall design and built quality is excellent. Also you can find every part just about anywhere. Big Bite auger is a great design, preimium materials and the warrenty is great. I would and have recomended this product. The toatal products ownded by our family and friends close to 20 devices so far with not a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine E.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but heavy, made in China, covered in oil.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it's made in China and I don't like that LEM doesn't seem to be very straightforward about that fact. I REALLY don't like that all of the parts which contact your food come bathed in thick synthetic oil. With all that said, it is probably still the best make of home use meat grinders available.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: model 12 grinder
customer_reviews.text: Grinder worked great. bought foot pedal and bag sealer with it both I would consider needed. all worked great only complaint I purchased the meat tray also and it was to tall to fit under the grinder. I had to elevate the grinder in order to grind into it. shorten the tray or raise the grinder an inch and problem will go away. First time grinding and everything easy. Will do all my own deer in future. Still trying to get the feed tube clean . Need to send some kind of brush that can clean with.
customer_reviews.author: Loye Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: We received grinder. NO REFUND NECESSARY.
customer_reviews.text: We received the grinder shortly after we ordered it, and we love it. We then received notice that we were receiving a refund for the grinder not being delivered. This is an error. Please do not issue a refund. We have it and are happy with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CMED

customer_reviews.title: amazing power
customer_reviews.text: wife got me this because my little nesco grinder which was 2 years old got stuck in reverse and wouldnt come out of it. this LEM product is solid, just like the LEM jerky gun. if your into jerky and making your own meats, go with the LEM brand, these guys got some good products, even though it was made in china. when i get a meat slicer it will be a LEM product.
customer_reviews.author: John McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: It’s the jam
customer_reviews.text: Wife said, “why we won’t ever use it”. She and I now do Italian sausage, burger and every other recipe we can find together. Easy to clean solid as all hell and more than we will ever need. This is the machine to have
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Shawn Holzworth

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, processed 150 lb. Of elk meat into burger flawlessly in one evening
customer_reviews.author: amie Zanone

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Did 500 lbs of hamburger in 3 days. Got hot right away. It had a drawer where there should be an air vent. Did the initial grind very well. The second grind was very slow, too much gap between the auger and throat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My family will hate me
customer_reviews.text: I'm seriously in love with this machine. I've cut my deer grind processing in to fractions of time. My family will hate me because we will be making sausage in the off season too. Note: just as any other using any grinder/stuffer, making sausage using this (while it works great doing it and will still do it faster than a small grinder/stuffer), still won't be as fast as using a an actual stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Segura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine-work
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased and with the foot-peddle it is fun for me to use. I use it to make the raw diet for my dog. Along with the bag and seal freezer kit I am set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Have only run one whitetail through this so far. It exceeded my expectations. Ground up the biggest hunks of meat I could feed into it without even sweating. If it lasts it was money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Baclay9

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Was going to return, but glad I didnt. Makes dog food prep fast and easy. Doesnt grind chicken bones well like others say. Wish there was a reverse mode to help clear an occasional backup. Overall Im happy with the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Some parts It turned to rusty
customer_reviews.text: I use it only once and after that some part of it started to rust from inside I can’t upload pictures to show you now i have to buy those rusty parts and replace them
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for hamburger. The wife was a little annoyed when cleaning it. Very nifty machine. Friends will see it and ask to borrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is a beast for it's size and power, it chews up anything you feed it. Quite, easy to use, and cleanup is pretty easy with the correct brushs for tight and narrow places.
customer_reviews.author: Ugo

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a ton of hrs and a back ache!
customer_reviews.text: Used the #12 for the first time with jerky attachment and it blew threw 16lbs of venison in about 2 minutes! That wasn’t even feeding full speed! Saved me a ton of hrs and a back ache! I’m looking forward to many years of use since it’s such a stought machine.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Roofer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my dog food
customer_reviews.text: Use this to grind meat and bones for my dog. Powerful and easy to handle. Chicken, game hens and quail, go through like butter.
customer_reviews.author: yeah07

customer_reviews.title: Grinds raw bone-in chicken with ease.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this grinder to prepare meat for cat food as well as grinding and packing sausages. This is my favorite purchase of the year! You do need to take your time when cleaning, there are a few spots that hold on to ground meat.
customer_reviews.author: W. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Love LEM
customer_reviews.text: Love LEM grinders. Big bite 8 has all metal gears! Great for grinding 1 deer or more takes no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Arrived , washed all parts and pieces , trimmed up 20 lbs of pork butt , and started grinding .....2 grinds and stuffed all 20lbs in casings 8/9 hours later done .. Worked Great !
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about this grinder. It works great and is very fast.Quite and easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: RAC

customer_reviews.title: Best grinder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is powerful enough to pull meat as fast as you can put into the throat without pushing.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, arrived on Time.
customer_reviews.text: The ease of use, the easy clean up and the total stainless steel surfaces makes it a dream. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Processes meat quickly and cleaning is fast. I wish I had of gotten one of these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is overkill for home use but worth every penny. Its build like a tank, parts are available and will last 2 lifetimes! If you are looking for a good quality grinder you found it. There is nothing that can be added to make it better, its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the big game hunter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder. Quiet and sturdy. The meat tray locks on which is a big plus. Grinds fast with minimal use of the stomper.
customer_reviews.author: Sy Contois

customer_reviews.title: Great for grinding not for stuffing
customer_reviews.text: Awsome piece of equipment for grinding meat. It is lightweight yet a workhorse. Ground over 160 pounds of pork and chicken quickly and efficiently. Easy to clean. However the stuffing (casing meat) feature only gets one star. Far too much muscle is required for a small amount of meat. Reverted to my old crank stuffer which requires less effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best grinder yet
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it. I have pushed 30lbs of axis through it and it didnt skip a beat. Think I'm gonna upgrade to a bigger very soon
customer_reviews.author: jeryd deaun malone

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Machine! Helped my husband with sausage making (2 ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME Machine! Helped my husband with sausage making (2 different kinds) and am ready for the next time. Machine does the grinding like a dream. Lots of parts to clean but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LoWo

customer_reviews.title: This thing rips!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to grind drumsticks and thighs for my Rottweiler's Raw. It does the job and then some. Easily ripping threw chicken, rabbit and deer meat. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best service ever
customer_reviews.text: This is Awesome top of the line. I would recommend this product to anyone. The delivery was just as fast. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Streich

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a rehab center that grinds meat for forty or so men so it gets used a lot. They sing its praises frequently.
customer_reviews.author: JLJr

customer_reviews.title: No reverse button
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to grind turkey for dog food, it binds up even with small pieces of bone and is a total pain to take apart to get unstuck. I don't understand why no reverse button, it is powerful and well made but without reverse, useless for me. I will sell it and purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home grinding!
customer_reviews.text: Great! We ground (double ground) 1/2 beef at one time without a problem! Happy with the quality and workload of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: DaNell K Pogatchnik

customer_reviews.title: Impressive performance
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I wish I had bought this years and years ago. It works great, quiet and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, built very good, need extra space for storing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a product to buy but you need a man to lift it! Storing could be a problem too.
customer_reviews.author: sawsusan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's safer than the one I was using. But don't grind as fast.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh....
customer_reviews.text: So I got it used it once and cleaned it went to use it again and the blot striped and apparently I'd missing a part that wasnt on it to strat with....calling the company tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Allison

product_meta.title: LEM Products Stainless Steel Big Bite Electric Meat Grinder
product_meta.description:
All stainless-steel motor housing, all metal gears with roller bearings, heavy duty handle for easy moving, 110 volt, permanently lubricated motor with improved grease formulation to reduce motor noise, built in circuit breaker, stainless steel knife, head, auger and large meat pan, stainless steel coarse (3/8") and fine (3/16") plates, 3 stuffing tubes, and meat stomper. Five-year factory warranty and lifetime customer support. ETL Certified to UL Standards.

LEM is a family owned company, passionate about bringing innovation to game processing. Our revolutionary Improved Big Bite Grinders live up to this passion with improved speed and performance that deliver a premium grind in half the time. The head design and advanced Big Bite technology offer a superior second grind, while virtually eliminating stomping and vastly improving the sausage stuffing function.

LEM products deliver high quality meat processing equipment: meat grinders, jerky making equipment, and vacuum sealers along with the needed supplies for the hunter and home meat processor. Our products allow everyone from butchers, restaurants, and the at-home meat processor to make delicious sausage, jerky and other meat products, all while controlling the healthy content of the foods they provide for their family and friends. We believe home processing to be an essential part of the outdoor experience and will continue to promote the responsible use of our greatest gift, the bountiful outdoors.
feature_bullets: .75HP grinder is a substantial step up from either the #5 or #8 Big Bite units; Quieter than ever while in use
Added tray in body for knife & plate storage; Extended auger pulls more meat in less time
Rifling pattern in head pushes meat forward with less user interaction
Modernized brushed steel finish - Minimizes fingerprint. Dimensions of grinder motor only: 7.5 W x 15.5 L x 13 H inches and dimensions of grinder fully assembled: 9.13 W x 20.24 L x 15.98 H inches
